long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are many good reasons for a cat meow! 
Stress Reduction and Anxiety Relief: Hearing a cat meow can help reduce stress and anxiety by triggering the release of oxytocin, a calming hormone.
Enhanced Social Bonding and Emotional Connection: A catâ€™s meow fosters a sense of companionship, helping alleviate loneliness and enhancing social bonds. 
Boost in Positive Mood and Dopamine Release: The sound of a cat meowing can trigger dopamine release, enhancing feelings of happiness and satisfaction.

Powered by meow-at.me you can can enjoy a cheerful meow anytime you need a boost! Click on the cat to hear a cute meow sound. The app icon and pop up cat changes the cat style periodically.
